mapper.select: SELECT id, title, content, writer, inserted, updated FROM Board ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT id, title, content, writer, inserted, updated FROM Board WHERE id = #{id} ORDER BY id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Board (title, content, writer) VALUES(#{title}, #{content}, #{writer})
mapper.update: UPDATE Board SET title=#{title}, content=#{content}, writer=#{writer}, inserted =#{inserted}, updated =NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
